description.narrative: Direct Project Costing, Effectiveness of Development Cooperation, & CPD Implementation Project

participating-org.narrative: MPTFO - Joint SDG Fund (previously known as The Joint Fund for the 2030 Agenda)
UGA Office of the Prime Mster

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

provider-org.narrative: MPTFO - Joint SDG Fund (previously known as The Joint Fund for the 2030 Agenda)
MPTFO - Joint SDG Fund (previously known as The Joint Fund for the 2030 Agenda)

description.narrative:
Output1: Enhanced programme cost recovery and/or direct project costing to the implementation of the UNDP Country Programme. (a) 64398 – Direct Project Costs in USD– Staffing. (b) 74598 – Direct Project Costs in USD – General Operating Expenses (GOE). Number of staff benefiting from DPC.
Output2:Improved Effectiveness of development Cooperation, & CPD Implementation 1) CPD annual portfolio review report/minutes in place. 2) Number of staff with skills and knowledge in target areas. 3) Annual NIM audit report in place. 4) Number of HACT micro-assessment reports. 5) A functional aid management platform. 6) UNDP Annual Report in place. 7) Up-to-date website in place. 8) Updated corporate brochure in place. 9) Op-eds in place. 10) Video blogs in place. 11).Number of planned evaluations conducted = 3 evaluations
Output 3: Enhanced SDG Implementation through Policy Innovation and effective Planning 3.1: No. of MDAs and LGs developing and implementing strategic development plans and frameworks and complying with NDPII Priorities.
3.2. Number of diagnostic studies published and disseminated

comment.narrative:
Output1: Enhanced programme cost recovery and/or direct project costing to the implementation of the UNDP Country Programme. (a) 64398 – Direct Project Costs in USD– Staffing =$1,349,000 (2016) ,Project/Programme Documents/Project reports/AWPs (b) 74598 – Direct Project Costs in USD – General Operating Expenses (GOE)=$0 (2016), Project/ Programme Documents/Project reports/AWPs Number of staff benefiting from DPC=45 (2016), Project/ Programme Documents/Project reports/AWPs
Output2:Improved Effectiveness of development Cooperation, & CPD Implementation 1) A CPD annual portfolio review report/minutes in place=A CPD annual portfolio review report/minutes in place.(2014), 2) Number of staff with skills and knowledge in target areas=106 (2016), training report. 3) Annual NIM audit report in place=Annual NIM audit report (2015), Annual NIM audit report. 4) Number of HACT micro-assessment reports=26 (2016), HACT website. 5) A functional aid management platform=partial (2016), Sector reports. 6) UNDP Annual Report in place=UNDP annual report (2016), UNDP website. 7) Up-to-date website in place=UNDP website (2016), UNDP website. 8) Updated corporate brochure in place=Updated corporate brochure (2016), UNDP website. 9) Op-eds in place=Op-eds in place (2016), UNDP website. 10) Video blogs in place=video blogs(2016), UNDP website. 11) 5 of planned evaluations conducted = 3 evaluations
Output 3: Enhanced SDG Implementation through Policy Innovation and effective Planning 3.1: No. of MDAs and LGs developing and implementing strategic development plans and frameworks and complying with NDPII Priorities = 1 (2016),
3.2). 2 diagnostic studies published and disseminated

Output1: Enhanced programme cost recovery and/or direct project costing to the implementation of the UNDP Country Programme (a) 64398 – Direct Project Costs in USD– Staffing = $1,100,900 (b) 74598 – Direct Project Costs in USD – General Operating Expenses (GOE) = $555,382 Number of staff benefiting from DPC.=50
Output2:Improved Effectiveness of development Cooperation, & CPD Implementation 1) A CPD annual portfolio review report/minutes in place = 2 Reports on CPD portfolio performance for 2017 and that of 2018 2) 60 staff with skills and knowledge in target areas, UNDP staff and partner capacities enhanced 3) Annual NIM audit report in place = 1 annual NIM audit completed 4) 6 HACT micro-assessment reports completed= 6 HACT micro-assessment reports 5) A functional aid management platform in place = Fully 6) UNDP Annual Report in place = 1 UNDP Annual Report 7) Up-to-date website in place = Annual up-to-date website 8) Updated corporate brochure in place = 1 corporate brochure updated 9) Op-eds in place = 2 Op-eds published 10) Video blogs in place = 2 video blogs 11. 3 planned evaluations completed
Output 3: Enhanced SDG Implementation through Policy Innovation and effective Planning 3.1: 8 MDAs and 70 LGs developing and implementing strategic development plans and frameworks and complying with NDPII Priorities 3.2 Three diagnostic studies published and disseminated

Output2:Improved Effectiveness of development Cooperation, & CPD Implementation 1) A CPD annual portfolio review report/minutes in place = 2 Reports on CPD portfolio performance for 2017 and that of 2018 2) 60 staff with skills and knowledge in target areas, UNDP staff and partner capacities enhanced 3) Annual NIM audit report in place = 1 annual NIM audit completed 4) 6 HACT micro-assessment reports completed= 6 HACT micro-assessment reports 5) A functional aid management platform in place = Fully 6) UNDP Annual Report in place = 1 UNDP Annual Report 7) Up-to-date website in place = Annual up-to-date website 8) Updated corporate brochure in place = 1 corporate brochure updated 9) Op-eds in place = 2 Op-eds published 10) Video blogs in place = 2 video blogs 11. 3 planned evaluations completed

Output1: Enhanced programme cost recovery and/or direct project costing to the implementation of the UNDP Country Programme (a) 64398 – Direct Project Costs in USD– Staffing = $1,323,912 (b) 74598 – Direct Project Costs in USD – General Operating Expenses (GOE) = $567,391 Number of staff benefiting from DPC = 50
Output2: Improved Effectiveness of development Cooperation, & CPD Implementation 1) A CPD annual portfolio review report/minutes in place 2) Number of staff with skills and knowledge in target areas = 81 more UNDP staff and partner capacities enhanced 3) Annual NIM audit report in place = NIM audit completed, Management Audit also undertaken and completed 4) 7 HACT micro-assessment reports completed 5) Number of planned evaluations conducted = 4 evaluations 6) A functional aid management platform = Fully in place 7) UNDP Annual Report in place = 1 UNDP Annual Report 8) Up-to-date website in place = Annual up-to-date website in place 9) Updated corporate brochure in place = 1 corporate brochure updated 10) Op-eds in place = 4 Op-eds published
Output 3: Enhanced SDG Implementation through Policy Innovation and effective Planning 1) Training for the development of the multidimensional Poverty Index (MPI) : MPI calculation workshop for the MPI taskforce team held between 25-27 September 2019. 2) Analytical paper on multi-dimensional poverty : Draft report produced. Awaiting final approval from Government. 3) Conduct consultation on the proposed MPI: Completed. Consultations with Government and Development Partners were made on 20th February 2019 at UNDP Offices and Regional Consultations were conducted from 26 to 28 March 2019. 4) Qualitative data collection for PSR (Mini PPA): Data collection was undertaken in in six districts: Kampala, Wakiso, Jinja, Arua, Mbarara and Mbale from 28th Oct -14th November. The Report to be finalised in Q1 2019. UNDP also provided technical assistance (2 Pax) to support the process and MFPED development policy unit in evidence based analytical work. 5) PSR preparation and printing: Draft report for PSR prepared. One local expert was hired to support the SDR and PSR production processes for 12 months ending September 2019.
Both reports are still ongoing.
